title: Parcel Check Room
content:
Parcel Check Room

State Regulations
§ 1220.70 - General
§ 1220.71 - Parcels acceptable for checking
§ 1220.72 - Liability for loss, damage or failure to deliver parcels limited
§ 1220.73 - Excess valuation of parcels not to exceed $200 on any one parcel
§ 1220.74 - Liability for valuation in excess of $25 limited to 10 days from date parcel checked
§ 1220.75 - Parcel check and/or excess value check to be issued for each parcel checked
§ 1220.76 - Procedure to be followed when check is lost
§ 1220.77 - Unclaimed parcels subject to sale 11 months from date checked
§ 1220.78 - Schedule of storage charges

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
